Package ohos.data.usage

Class Volume

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.data.usage.Volume

  • public final class Volume
extends Object
    Provides methods for querying information about storage devices.
    Since:
    1

    • Method Detail

      • isEmulated

        public boolean isEmulated​()
        Checks whether a device is a virtual device.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the device is a virtual device; returns false otherwise.

      • isPluggable

        public boolean isPluggable​()
        Checks whether a device is swappable.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the device is swappable; returns false otherwise.

      • getState

        public MountState getState​()
        Obtains the mount state of this volume. The mount state can be mounted, unmounted, removed, or unknown.
        Returns:
        Returns MountState, which indicates the mount state of this volume.
        Since:
        3
